sentences.sContent: Lifeguards are trained to deal with emergencies.
sentences.sCn: 救生员接受过应对紧急情况的训练。

sentences.sContent: (= In case of emergency ), press the alarm button.
sentences.sCn: 遇到紧急情况，请按报警按钮。

sentences.sContent: The plane had to make an emergency landing.
sentences.sCn: 那架飞机不得不紧急着陆。

sentences.sContent: The government called an emergency meeting to discuss the crisis.
sentences.sCn: 政府召开了紧急会议，讨论这次危机。

sentences.sContent: Yesterday, the centre's board held an emergency meeting.
sentences.sCn: 昨天，中心的董事会召开了一次紧急会议。
